alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 30 at 12:42AM CST until November 30 at 1:15AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CST FOR CENTRAL PIKE AND SOUTHEASTERN AMITE COUNTIES... At 1242 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gillsburg, or 11 miles east of Liberty, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mccomb, Magnolia, Summit and Mccomb Airport. This includes Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 7 and 19. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
